content:
I remember there is a policy requires that people should belong to a team to have bot permissions.
Does https://github.com/sanxiyn belong to any team ? I grep the team repo (https://github.com/rust-lang/team) but cannot find any clues.
I know sanxiyn is an long term contributor even before Rust 1.0. I am just curious about this problem.

You are not required to be a part of a team to gain permissions to instruct bors. The permission to do so is sometimes granted to contributors for practical purposes. Other times it's grandfathered from their former belonging to a team.
As far as sanxiyn goes I believe their permissions predates the concept of a team.
